bioconda.name: bioconductor-wavcluster
bioconda.summary: Sensitive and highly resolved identification of RNA-protein interaction sites in PAR-CLIP data

biotools.summary: The package provides an integrated pipeline for the analysis of PAR-CLIP data. PAR-CLIP-induced transitions are first discriminated from sequencing errors, SNPs and additional non-experimental sources by a non- parametric mixture model. The protein binding sites (clusters) are then resolved at high resolution and cluster statistics are estimated using a rigorous Bayesian framework.

bioschemas.name: wavClusteR
bioschemas.summary: The package provides an integrated pipeline for the analysis of PAR-CLIP data. The protein binding sites (clusters) are then resolved at high resolution and cluster statistics are estimated using a rigorous Bayesian framework.
